ygData.subject: Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually the Plane of Fear is entered behind the Spectre Cave in the Feerott. Guarded by a pushover L40 Necromancer named Cyndreela...HUGE orange gate cant
ygData.messageBody:
> Anyone else jacked up about the plane of FEAR opening tomorrow? I
> for one am going in there naked with a drum and a minotaur horn... scout
> around a little! Fear would be entered through Oasis I presume. O how the
> spectres will be running around the beach tomorrow I have a feeling!
>
> Roop

Actually the Plane of Fear is entered behind the Spectre Cave in the Feerott.
Guarded by a pushover L40 Necromancer named Cyndreela...HUGE orange gate cant
miss it =)
PS. I wouldn't touch this plane with a 10 foot pole unless your in a full group
of 45+ The L62 DrachoLiche is quite intense ; )
Karnek D'Jester
L41 Bard of Erollisi Marr
